reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Discrete cutting board that can be left on counter for those quick uses of cutting up a snack or something to throw in a pot . I love that I can leave it out and it doesn’t look clutter on my counter tops.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love it easy to clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smaller than Expected
reviews.reviewText: Was hoping this could be a permanent solution to my cooking board saga - it is bit smaller and hard to keep in place. After one use, it already had some scars in the plastic. It's okay for a cooking board rotation but not being the main one

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Missing item from package
reviews.reviewText: I like the cutting board, but I did not received the anti slip silicone stickers to keep it from moving all around while I’m trying to cut vegetables. Can you please forward the stickers to me? Then I’d be most happy to give a 5 star review!Thank you Nancy C

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight, but does scratch easily
reviews.reviewText: I bought this acrylic cutting board for my kitchen counter top with lip and I was impressed by how well it fits on the edge of the counter. It is very easy to clean and store, and it comes with a silicone sheet to prevent slipping. The cutting board is also very clear and modern looking, but you have to remove the protective film before using it.However, I also noticed that the acrylic material scratches easily, which might bother some people who care about the appearance of their cutting boards. I also prefer the feel of wood cutting boards over acrylic ones, but that is a personal preference. Overall, this is a nice cutting board that does its job, but it is not perfect. I would recommend it to anyone who likes the style and convenience of acrylic cutting boards.
